item.title: EE vs CE vs CS: Which is best?
item.description: Disclaimer The point of this article is to give personal insight about a topic that often confuses a lot of people. While I have no agenda to push, my personal experiences bias me towards having certain opinions. When making choices as large as choosing your degree, be sure to get as many opinions as you can before committing to something. Introduction There often is a lot of confusion about
